Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value for money in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: clare_nz_11
Reviews.Content: stayed double five nights november price extremely spacious luxurious – sofa coffee table desk wardrobe bathroom entrance hallway bed amazingly comfortable especially havent slept decent bed internet complementary reasonably fast décor feel bit dated service facilities day pool gym relax cool day pool busy pays sun bathe gym equipped adjoining bathroom sauna nice ate italian restaurant front hotel couple times enjoyed food aussie legends bar grab beer relax surrounding cheaper local food eateries plenty supermarkets buy food youre tighter budget caught buses metro system mind buses dont cash prepurchased tickets metro stations ticket kiosks metro shuts fridays 1pm – caught leaving airport taking taxi instead 15 minute walk metro hotel height summer painful experience november bearable taking taxi town cheaper option youre travelling larger people price definitely stay time dubai
